page.title: 13HOME LIFE IN PANTON
page.content: {PANTON }households tend to be fairly self-sufficient because of their rural setting. Most grow their own produce and shopping is done on a weekly or fortnightly basis in either Lincoln or Louth. Many visitors from outside the area consider the houses very isolated but none of the residents would consider themselves lonely. There are frequent visits from neigh- bours and other friends and it is the norm for such visitors to stop for a cup of tea. Children are not able to "drop in" on each other but will tend to stay for the day or evening having been brought by their parents in the car. There is a splendid feeling of time and space in {PANTON }which in modern living is a luxury. There is time to talk and to listen.
